info.title: Documenso v2 API
info.description:
Welcome to the Documenso v2 API.

This API provides access to our system, which you can use to integrate applications, automate workflows, or build custom tools.

get.description: Find all attachments for an envelope

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.envelopes.attachments.find(envelope_id="<id>")

    # Handle response
    print(res)

post.description: Create a new attachment for an envelope

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.envelopes.attachments.create(envelope_id="<id>", data={
        "label": "<value>",
        "data": "https://lustrous-skeleton.info",
    })

    # Handle response
    print(res)

from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.envelopes.items.delete(envelope_id="<id>", envelope_item_id="<id>")

    # Handle response

get.description: Download an envelope item by its ID

parameters.name: envelopeItemId
parameters.description: The ID of the envelope item to download.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the envelope item to download. "signed" returns the completed document with signatures, "original" returns the original uploaded document.

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
import documenso_sdk
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.envelopes.items.download(envelope_item_id="<id>", version=documenso_sdk.EnvelopeItemDownloadVersion.SIGNED)

    # Handle response
    print(res)

get.description: Returns an envelope recipient given an ID

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.envelopes.recipients.get(recipient_id=8771.72)

    # Handle response
    print(res)

post.description: Create multiple recipients for an envelope

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
import documenso_sdk
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.envelopes.recipients.create_many(envelope_id="<id>", data=[
        {
            "email": "Ed16@yahoo.com",
            "name": "<value>",
            "role": documenso_sdk.EnvelopeRecipientCreateManyRoleRequest.SIGNER,
        },
    ])

    # Handle response
    print(res)

post.description: Create an envelope using form data.

enum: EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy hh:mm a

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
import documenso_sdk
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.envelopes.create(payload={
        "title": "<value>",
        "type": documenso_sdk.EnvelopeCreateType.TEMPLATE,
    })

    # Handle response
    print(res)

post.description: Create a document envelope from a template envelope. Upload custom files to replace the template PDFs and map them to specific envelope items using identifiers.

enum: EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy hh:mm a

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.envelopes.use(payload={
        "envelope_id": "<id>",
        "recipients": [],
    })

    # Handle response
    print(res)

enum: EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy hh:mm a

Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:

post.description: Redistribute the envelope to the provided recipients who have not actioned the envelope. Will use the distribution method set in the envelope

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.envelopes.redistribute(envelope_id="<id>", recipients=[])

    # Handle response
    print(res)

get.description: Returns a document given an ID

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.documents.get(document_id=6150.61)

    # Handle response
    print(res)

get.description: Find documents based on a search criteria

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The pagination page number, starts at 1.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of items per page.

parameters.name: templateId
parameters.description: Filter documents by the template ID used to create it.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: Filter documents by how it was created.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter documents by the current status

parameters.name: folderId
parameters.description: Filter documents by folder ID

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
import documenso_sdk
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.documents.find(order_by_direction=documenso_sdk.OrderByDirection.DESC)

    # Handle response
    print(res)

post.description: Redistribute the document to the provided recipients who have not actioned the document. Will use the distribution method set in the document

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.documents.redistribute(document_id=9084.69, recipients=[
        6011.8,
        4441.56,
        4251.15,
    ])

    # Handle response
    print(res)

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The ID of the document to download.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the document to download. "signed" returns the completed document with signatures, "original" returns the original uploaded document.

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
import documenso_sdk
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.documents.download(document_id=5396.97, version=documenso_sdk.DocumentDownloadVersion.SIGNED)

    # Handle response
    print(res)

get.description: Get a pre-signed download URL for the original or signed version of a document

parameters.name: documentId
parameters.description: The ID of the document to download.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The version of the document to download. "signed" returns the completed document with signatures, "original" returns the original uploaded document.

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
import documenso_sdk
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.document.document_download(document_id=9550.11, version=documenso_sdk.DocumentDownloadBetaVersion.SIGNED)

    # Handle response
    print(res)

post.description: You will need to upload the PDF to the provided URL returned. Note: Once V2 API is released, this will be removed since we will allow direct uploads, instead of using an upload URL.

enum: EEEE, MMMM dd, yyyy hh:mm a

post.description: Create a single field for a document.

x-codeSamples.label: Typescript (SDK)
Go (SDK)
Python (SDK)
x-codeSamples.source:
import documenso_sdk
from documenso_sdk import Documenso
import os


with Documenso(
    api_key=os.getenv("DOCUMENSO_API_KEY", ""),
) as documenso:

    res = documenso.documents.fields.create(document_id=8001.93, field={
        "type": documenso_sdk.FieldCreateDocumentFieldTypeNameRequest1.NAME,
        "recipient_id": 2564.68,
        "page_number": 791.77,
        "page_x": 7845.22,
        "page_y": 6843.16,
        "width": 3932.15,
        "height": 8879.89,
    })

    # Handle response
    print(res)
